message.name: INF_CONTACTS_FV_CONTACTADDRESS_EMPTY
message.locale: No address has been entered.

message.name: INF_CONTACTS_FV_CONTACTEMAIL_EMPTY
message.locale: No email address has been entered.

message.name: INF_CONTACTS_FV_CONTACTPHONE_EMPTY
message.locale: No phone number has been entered.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XFV_CONCERNROLECONTACT_EQUAL
message.locale: A client cannot be a contact for themselves.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XFV_CONCERN_DUPLICATE
message.locale: This concern already exists as a contact for this client.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XFV_CONCERNROLECONTACT_DUPLICATENAME
message.locale: This name has previously been selected for another contact for this client, please choose another.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_CONCERNROLE_STARTDATE_EARLY
message.locale: The start date for the contact must be no earlier than the client's start date.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_CONCERNROLE_STARTDATE_LATER
message.locale: The start date for the contact cannot be later than the client's end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_RELATEDCONROLE_STARTDATE_EARLY
message.locale: The start date for the contact must be no earlier than their own start date.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_CONCERNROLE_ENDDATE_LATER
message.locale: The end date for the contact cannot be later than the client's end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_RELATEDCONROLE_ENDDATE_EARLY
message.locale: The start date for the contact cannot be later than their own end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_RELATEDCONROLE_ENDDATE_LATER
message.locale: The end date for the contact cannot be later than their own end date.

message.name: INF_CONTACT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: %1s: Contact for %2s

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_CONCERNROLE_STARTDATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The from date for the contact must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XFV_PHONE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: A phone type is required when a phone number is specified.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A Contact Name must be entered

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: A Contact must be selected

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XFV_NAME_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: A Contact Name and a Contact Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New contacts cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Contacts of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Contacts for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTS_RELATEDCONROLE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as a new client contact.
